name: Rage Face
description:
You must fight off the deadly sins, but to do so you must first hurt yourself.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left Mouse Button to punch in the direction you're looking

Instructions

  • Manage your health, shown in the top-left.
  • Enemies in your aura take damage
  • The less health you have, the more damage your aura does
  • The less health you have, the higher your score multiplier
  • Punch to push enemies away
  • Look for health packs to stay alive
  • Maintain low health and kill enemies without dying to get high scores

Enemies (The Sins)

  • Envy: Small, light green, always follows you
  • Greed: Small, dark green, always follow you, steals your points on contact
  • Lust:  Small, purple, always follow you, heals you
  • Pride: Small, yellow, on a soapbox, never moves but deals massive damage on contact
  • Gluttony: Large, gray, eats health packs
  • Sloth: Very large, brown, barely moves, has tons of health and is worth lots of points

Source Code: https://github.com/DingoEatingFuzz/RageFace
